message:
SYSTEM: MariaNavas_STLab_Research_Stay.pptx: Diapositiva {31}
So we have about 200 judgments in 			   the form of sets of named graphs, with 	         some hierarchical metadata.
We input it to Virtuoso and Blazegraph to start playing…
From the two lines of research previously discussed, I of course started with events 
Aldo Gangemi provides some queries to “detect most verbal events”
I start exploring both how to detect these events and temporal expressions…
Funnily, it works more or less nice for events (acceptable precission, bad recall) but not for temporal expressions!
speaker: SYSTEM
